On the 30th anniversary of Ronald Reagan 's inaugural, National Review Online spoke with Mike Pence about the Gipper, asking what his legacy means to him and the GOP. Ronald Reagan is the reason I'm a Republican, Mike Pence tells us. ''I was active in local Democratic politics when I was a teenager in Columbus, Indiana. Then I started to hear the voice of a B-movie actor, turned governor, turned candidate.

, who plays scathing cheerleading coach Sue Sylvester on the TV show, believes there are many similarities between the teacher and the straight-talking talent show judge. Jane Lynch Inspired By Simon Cowell For Glee Character. She said: If ever there was a guy who tells it like it is, then it's Simon Cowell . You could definitely look at Sue and say there's a lot of Simon Cowell in her. He's a great inspiration for the character of Sue- there is a lot that I can take from him and put into her. Jane Lynch also admitted she is ''amazed'' by the public's reaction to Sue and believes people admire her in the same way they respect music mogul Simon Cowell .
